events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position, including their resume and portfolio.
The application was reviewed and categorised under engineering roles based on skills listed in software development and DevOps.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage this software engineering candidate's recruitment process moving forward.
An initial screening call was conducted to discuss the candidate's experience with programming languages and DevOps tools.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm for the opportunity and providing additional information about relevant projects.
A technical interview with the engineering team was scheduled to evaluate the candidate's coding skills and system design knowledge.
The technical interview was completed successfully, with the candidate demonstrating strong problem-solving and coding abilities.
Following the technical round, an HR interview was arranged to discuss the candidate's cultural fit and compensation expectations.
The HR interview concluded positively, with the candidate aligning well with company values and showing interest in the role.
A formal job offer for the software engineer position was extended to the candidate, including salary and benefits details.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement about potentially joining the engineering team.
The candidate accepted the job offer, confirming their start date and eagerness to contribute as a software engineer.
Onboarding activities commenced, including system setup, orientation sessions, and introduction to the engineering team.
The hiring process was officially closed with the candidate fully onboarded and ready to start contributing to engineering projects.
